party-sheet.invalid-template:
The template you are using is invalid.
Please check the template and try again.
party-sheet.no-players: No players are currently logged in.
party-sheet.no-systems: You do not have any json files for this system in your data/partysheets folder. Please add some to enable this feature.

hide-sheet.hint: Edit which characters are displayed if not showing online characters.

refresh-rate.name: Refresh Rate
refresh-rate.hint: How often the group sheet is refreshed in seconds. A lower value may cause performance issues. Default (off) is 0.

enable-minimal-view.name: Hide Support Buttons
enable-minimal-view.hint: Hide the buttons for bug reports and feedback.

enable-only-online.name: Show only online characters
enable-only-online.hint: Only show characters assigned to logged in players. Turning this off will show all non-NPC characters but allow you to 'hide' the ones you don't care about.

enable-dark-mode.name: Enable Dark Mode
enable-dark-mode.hint: Enable dark mode for the party sheet.

show-debug-info.name: Show Debug Information
show-debug-info.hint: Enable this to show debug information in the console for all parsed characters when the party sheet is opened. Hopefully this will allow you to track down specific properties that you are trying to parse.

show-template-status-form.name: Show Template Status Form
show-template-status-form.hint: This will show you which templates are out of date, which have newer systems installed, and which have no version information.

template-status.out-of-date: The following templates are out of date
template-status.newer-required-system: The following templates need newer systems installed
template-status.no-version-information: The following templates have no version information
template-status.no-system-information: The following templates have no system information
